body: Amy, I will admit that I am not sure exactly what you are talking about.  Do you mean surface temperature?  If so, you want to run a Honeybee energy simulation and use the Color Surfaces with EP Result component with surface temperature as your srfData. If you are interested not in the temperature of a surface but the temperature that a person feels at a given set of points in space, you want something similar to the comfort maps that I have been working on for my thesis. Example file: [https://app.box.com/s/11abiyglfuaigd3tay85hqtbzi2iymue](https://app.box.com/s/11abiyglfuaigd3tay85hqtbzi2iymue) Presentation: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/ami1gift3cz2etb/ComfortMap%20Presentation...](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ami1gift3cz2etb/ComfortMap%20Presentation.pdf?dl=0) Conceptual Image: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/JeioNtmyO2ZpPLqSbn2eIpuEsXcDPnjSIqgdJjJYFtiLyr6abpzMcHlN2uaNbqLC03ErKgC0eIoY87JwWKcaDLkF5-1HK*XK/ComfortMap_Page_07.png) -Chris
